description: Since switching to postmarketos / gnome mobile, purple no longer works for me like it did on phosh, not a problem with the app neccissarilly, but I wish it played nice for me on here
setup was so easy, it was nonexistent-- open the app, power on the machine. and it does exactly what it says!

Thank you for adding volume controls!
I'm very happy with this roku remote and it works amazingly on my linux phone!
